bibl.title: Four Early Biblical Codex Fragments in Australia. Putting the Pieces Together. (Buried History Occasional Papers. 1.)
bibl.note: Présentation de codices bibliques fragmentaires, grecs et coptes, conservés en Australie. - Pp. 5-14: P. Macquarie Inv. 360 [ed.: S.R. PICKERING, P. Macquarie Inv. 360 (+ P. Mil. Vogl. Inv. 1224): Acta Apostolorum 2.30-37, 2.46-3.2, ZPE 65 (1986) pp. 76-78 et pl. I b-c] et P. Coll. privées: P. Deissmann [ed.: G.H.R. HORSLEY, An Unpublished Septuaginta Papyrus from the Nachlass of Adolf Deissmann, ArchPF 39 (1993) pp. 35-38 et figg. 14-15].
bibl.seg: HORSLEY G.H.R., Four Early Biblical Codex Fragments in Australia. Putting the Pieces Together. (Buried History Occasional Papers. 1.)
Melbourne, The Australian Institute of Archaeology, 1994, 8°, [iv]-20 pp. et 5 pll. ISBN 0-909923-16-7.

Présentation de codices bibliques fragmentaires, grecs et coptes, conservés en Australie. - Pp. 5-14: P. Macquarie Inv. 360 [ed.: S.R. PICKERING, P. Macquarie Inv. 360 (+ P. Mil. Vogl. Inv. 1224): Acta Apostolorum 2.30-37, 2.46-3.2, ZPE 65 (1986) pp. 76-78 et pl. I b-c] et P. Coll. privées: P. Deissmann [ed.: G.H.R. HORSLEY, An Unpublished Septuaginta Papyrus from the Nachlass of Adolf Deissmann, ArchPF 39 (1993) pp. 35-38 et figg. 14-15].
